course.subject: CENG
course.name: MPhil Thesis Research
course.description: Master's thesis research supervised by a faculty member.  A successful defense of the thesis leads to the grade Pass.  No course credit is assigned.

reviews.author: sachit
reviews.title: Thesis
reviews.comment_content: My Mphil was really interesting. A crosspollination between different research domains and subjects.
reviews.comment_teaching: All compulsory and elective courses act as a foundation to your research thesis. Your supervisor (s) guide you and it is ultimately on you how you carve your own path of research journey.
reviews.comment_grading: I cannot comment on this since it is not specific to any course. But in this case, the criteria is how successfully you defend your thesis against thesis committee panel.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is purely dependant on your thesis topic and also on your supervisor.
